env.label: NETWORK
env.description: Which existing user defined network to connect the container too. Note that 'bridge' will not work.

env.name: TZ
env.label: TZ
env.description: Timezone

env.name: TRAEFIK_PROVIDERS_DOCKER
env.label: TRAEFIK_PROVIDERS_DOCKER
env.description: Enable Docker backend with default settings.

env.name: TRAEFIK_PROVIDERS_DOCKER_EXPOSEDBYDEFAULT
env.label: TRAEFIK_PROVIDERS_DOCKER_EXPOSEDBYDEFAULT
env.description: Expose containers by default. If set traefik.enable=true should be set as a label on the container.

env.name: TRAEFIK_API_INSECURE
env.label: TRAEFIK_API_INSECURE
env.description: Activate API directly on the entryPoint named traefik.

env.name: TRAEFIK_API
env.label: TRAEFIK_API
env.description: Activate API.

env.name: TRAEFIK_API_DASHBOARD
env.label: TRAEFIK_API_DASHBOARD
env.description: Activate dashboard via API.

env.name: TRAEFIK_ACCESSLOG
env.label: TRAEFIK_ACCESSLOG
env.description: Enable access logging.

env.name: TRAEFIK_ACCESSLOG_ADDINTERNALS
env.label: TRAEFIK_ACCESSLOG_ADDINTERNALS
env.description: Enables access log for internal services (ping, dashboard, etc...).

env.name: TRAEFIK_SERVERSTRANSPORT_INSECURESKIPVERIFY
env.label: TRAEFIK_SERVERSTRANSPORT_INSECURESKIPVERIFY
env.description: Skip verification of the server's certificate.
